HOFer Roger Bresnahan M101-3 Sporting News postcard.  1" light crease to the left of Bresnahan's right knee (more visible on back).  Corners are nice.

SOLD delivered net to me, with payment by PayPal "Friend" preferred.

PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Thanks!
